content: Retirement Lifestyle General Asked by AnonymousAsked on 11 Apr 2019What are some possibilities of housewife's (not IT savvy) hustles? If one could recall, in the past, housewife could collect and fold letters, into envelops and get a small fee. It seems there are no more such thing today. In this day and digital age, what are some hustles which they could do if they had time at home to earn some side income? Assuming they do not use a computer / smart phone.1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 11 Apr 2019Baking and cooking? Theres some who sell cookies and cooked meals.But if it is more commercial and large scale then need license I think.Can try looking after kids? Or help others clean house? Or if you are always at home can try this  https://www.parknparcel.com.sg/ People always miss parcel delivery, you can help them.0 comments0
